合同演習が開かれると聞いてやってきたが――: I heard there was going to be a joint exercise, but...
ユリア？ どうしてここに？: Julia? What are you doing here?
今日は私も『ゲスト』として、合同演習に参加する日なんだ！: Today's my day as a 'guest' to participate in joint exercises!
ピコピコピーン！\nマスターのナビゲーターなボクが華麗な説明を――:
Beep, beep, boop, boo!
I'm the owner's navigator, so I give a gorgeous explanation――
なんでですか！？\nボクにも活躍するチャンスをくださいよ！:
Why?!
Give me a chance to shine, too!
悪い悪い、冗談だ。いきなり出てきたから反射的にな……\nたまにはピコも活躍したい:
Sorry, sorry, I was just joking. It came out of nowhere, so I reflexively...
Pico wants to play an active role every once in a while. Well then, please explain.
たまには……まあいいでしょう。コホン…それでは説明しましょう！\n合同演習、正式:
Once in a while... Well, that's fine. Ahem... Then let me explain!
This joint exercise is officially called 'School Tactical Training'!
みんなは略して『戦術演習』って呼んでますね！: Everyone calls it a tactical exercise for short!
各校舎から優秀なパイロットたちをゲストとして招き、みんなで\nＭＧ操縦技術を向上:
We invited excellent pilots from each building as guests, and we all worked together
It's a special training program designed to improve MG piloting skills!
校舎の垣根を越えて、がんばっていきましょう！: Let's do our best across the school building!
って、普通にネット検索したら出てきたな……: Wait, when I searched the internet normally, it came up...
なんでボクが説明している間に調べちゃうんですか！？: Why are you investigating while I'm explaining?!
ん？ あっ！ そっか！ キミは初めてかぁ！: Hm? Oh! I see! So this is your first time!
他のカオスメイデンのメンバーは来てないのか？: The other Chaos Maiden members aren't here?
おおっ♪ 私以外にも面白そうな人たちがいっぱい来てるみたいだね！\n毎回呼ばれる:
Ohh♪ Looks like there's a lot of interesting people here besides me!
It's not like I'll be called every time, so I'm having a lot more fun!
学園は結果を出した方にたんまり豪華報酬を出すみたいなんで、\nみんなやる気満々で:
It seems like the academy pays extravagant rewards to those who get results.
Everyone's so fired up!
こういうのに積極的に参加すると、\nパイロットとしての成長も早いだろうな。:
If you actively participate in this kind of thing,
I'm sure he'll grow up quickly as a pilot.
